name: The Quarter Chaophraya By Uhg
description: Situated in Bangkok, 4.2 km from Wat Arun, The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and organising tours for guests. Rooms include a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony and some have city views. At the hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards and table tennis at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG, and car hire is available. Staff speak English, Thai and Filipino at the reception. Wat Pho is 4.2 km from the hotel, while Temple of the Emerald Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 30 km from The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG.

name: The Salil Hotel Riverside Bangkok
description: Set in Bangkok, 6.1 km from Lumpini Park, The Salil Hotel Riverside Bangkok offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the property also features a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. An American breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Jim Thompson House is 6.3 km from The Salil Hotel Riverside Bangkok, while MBK Center is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

name: Conrad Bangkok
address: All Seasons Place 87/3 Wireless Rd., Bangkok 10330
description: Conrad Bangkok is an urban hideaway in the heart of Bangkok. Located in the commercial district, the hotel connects you to renowned tourist attractions, shopping centers, iconic landmarks, and service facilities such as Central Embassy, Lumphini Park, Bumrungrad International Hospital, and Erawan Shrine. We offer a complimentary shuttle bus every 15 minutes to the nearest BTS station, Phloen Chit, which is within easy reach. Conrad Bangkok comprises 391 rooms and suites and provides service facilities to hotel guests such as complimentary WiFi, valet parking, and notable restaurants where we serve authentic Cantonese cuisine as well as international fare. Pamper yourself in our recreational facilities on Level 7, such as BodyWorx, our 24/7 fitness center which features a fully equipped yoga room, steam room and sauna, Seasons Spa with 11 luxurious treatment rooms to enhance your health, beauty, and wellbeing. In addition, an outdoor area with a stunning view of the city includes a temperature-controlled outdoor swimming pool, two tennis courts, kid playground, and a jogging track. Conrad Bangkok also offers a professional events space utilizing the latest technology and is one of Bangkok's most versatile meeting and conferencing venues featuring a one-of-a-kind, 34-meter LED screen and 22 meeting rooms.Hilton

name: The Landmark Bangkok
description: Boasting impressive views of Bangkok, this 5-star hotel is a brief stroll from BTS Phloen Chit Station. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Viva Jiva Spa and Fitness First Platinum Health Club. This modern hotel offers a sauna, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. There is also free public parking on site for those with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and a rain shower. They each provide tea and coffee making facilities, slippers and a flat-screen TV. Guests of Landmark Bangkok are welcome to experience international cuisine at Rib Room & Bar, or try Chinese dishes at Sui Sian Chinese Restaurant. Dining options at the hotel include Landmark Bakery & Café and Greenhouse. Other dining options are also available. Located in the lively Khlong Toei area, Hotel The Landmark Bangkok is surrounded by restaurants, bars and night clubs. Guests can also visit Terminal 21, Soi Cowboy and Embassy of the United States.Revato

name: Summit Windmill Golf Residence
description: Summit Windmill Golf Suite Hotel at Suvarnabhumi is located along Bangna-Trad Road, a 40-minute drive to central Bangkok. The hotel features free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, an outdoor pool and a golf course. The air-conditioned units come with private balconies, living area and a kitchen. Washing machines and ironing facilities are provided. The hotel offers a DVD library and laundry services. Other facilities include a 24-hour front desk and free onsite parking. Thai and European cuisines are served at The Café. Golfer’s Lounge provides Asian specialties, international beer and cocktails. Summit Windmill Golf Suite Hotel at Suvarnabhumi is a 15-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Airport shuttle service can be arranged upon request.

name: Arnoma Grand
description: Arnoma Hotel Bangkok is conveniently surrounded by 10 shopping malls, with Gaysorn located next door and Central World Plaza located across the road. Just 300 metres from Chidlom Skytrain Station, it features both indoor and outdoor pools. Guests can lounge by the pool’s sundeck or join aerobic and yoga classes. Arnoma Hotel has a fitness centre, hot tub, and sauna. Massage services are available. The air-conditioned rooms at Arnoma Hotel have city views of Bangkok. Each room has cable/satellite TV and a safety deposit box. A fridge and tea/coffee making facilities are also provided. Trattoria Felice Restaurant serves Italian specialities for lunch and dinner, while Ah Yat Abalone Seafood Restaurant serves fresh seafood. Drinks are available at Camelot Wine Pub. Arnoma Hotel Bangkok is 23 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. It is a block away from the Erawan Shrine. Airport shuttle service is available upon request.

name: Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok
description: Located in Bangkok, 3.5 km from MBK Center, Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. At Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok you will find a restaurant serving American, Steakhouse and Asian cuisine. Jim Thompson House is 3.9 km from the hotel, while Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok.

name: Eastin Grand Hotel Phayathai
description: No description found

name: The Fig Lobby
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.1 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, The Fig Lobby offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The hotel features a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. At The Fig Lobby every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or an Asian breakfast. Emporium Shopping Mall is 1.9 km from The Fig Lobby, while Lumpini Park is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 27 km from the hotel.

name: W Bangkok
address: 106 North Sathorn Road, Silom, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500
description: W Bangkok fuels travel appetites with its proximity to the BTS Station for easy access to the rest of the city. Cruise down the Chao Phraya River and take in the sights and sounds of Bangkok. Premier shopping outlets like ICONSIAM and Siam Paragon are within minutes of our 5-star hotel in Sathorn, Bangkok, while spiritual sanctuaries like the Temple of Emerald Buddha and Wat Pho offer quiet retreats. Dive into history at The Grand Palace or dine at our very own The House on Sathorn, a national heritage site, now one of the premier restaurants in Bangkok. The House on Sathorn is known for its modern Thai seafood cuisine. The WET® Deck serves up cocktails and quick bites by the pool. Unwind in our hotel in Bangkok, Thailand's AWAY® Spa or sweat it out in our FIT gym. Host your next meeting in a magnetic venue like the Great Room. Our Whatever/Whenever® service means you get what you need when you need it. The stylish, vibrant rooms and suites make your stay at W Bangkok a memorable one.Marriott

name: Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20
description: Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 hotel is an upscale full-service hotel that offers modern facilities and accommodations. For food loving guests we offer our full executive Sky Club Lounge, on-site GourmetBar and Food Exchange. If you're more into relaxation, come by the Infinity Pool, Kids Club and spa! Being located in the heart of Sukhumvit, Bangkok's shopping and restaurant district, the hotel is just a few minutes walk to Sukhumvit MRT and Asoke BTS station. Just hop onto our hotel Tuk Tuk service!accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park
description: Indulge in the convenience of a prime hotel location in Bangkok. Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park, located in the Silom district of Bangkok. Only steps from Sala Daeng BTS Station and Silom MRT Station, puts you right in the heart of the city. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, our location ensures easy access to cultural attractions and shopping complexes. Within minutes, you can explore Silom's renowned shopping destinations, such as Siam Paragon, Chinatown, and the Chao Phraya River. Our hotel is the preferred choice for corporate events and customized banquets, boasting eleven meeting venues. Whether you're hosting a conference or planning a special celebration, our dedicated team is here to provide personalized service. Experience a seamless check-in process with the assistance of our dedicated Japanese-speaking guest relations and friendly front desk team located in the lobby on the 23rd floor. Elevating your stay with our newly renovated rooms providing breathtaking views of the vibrant Bangkok cityscape. From international delights to local specialties. Treat your taste buds at Panorama all day dining restaurant. Explore further dining options at Xian Tian Di Chinese Restaurant. Enjoy a selection of premium whiskeys at The Finishing Post Bar, or a glass of craft beer at Tap It. Book your stay with us and make the most memorable trip in Bangkok.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport
address: 599/9 Lat Krabang Road, Lat Krabang, Racha Thewa 10520
description: Courtyard provides flexibility and choices for our guests. With locally- inspired three meal a day restaurant options, Courtyard is your destination for a great breakfast, or drinks and dinner during the evening. You'll also enjoy inviting, flexible spaces where you can work or relax, including our signature media pods, and free Wi-Fi throughout. Plus, our well-equipped fitness center will help you stay refreshed and energized. Whether traveling for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard is sure to be comfortable and productive!Marriott

name: Intercontinental Bangkok Sukhumvit
address: 10 Soi Sukhumvit 59, Sukhumvit Road,Klongtan Nua, Watthana, Bangkok 00000
description: Set in the vibrant district of Sukhumvit - the new hot spot for business and lifestyle in Bangkok, InterContinental Bangkok Sukhumvit makes a luxurious and relaxing base for unparalleled experiences. With the Thonglor BTS station a 5 minutes' walk away, enjoy direct access to renowned UNESCO office, commercial hubs and departmental stores.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Westin Grande Sukhumvit, Bangkok
description: Recharge at The Westin Grande Sukhumvit, Bangkok. Find us in the Bangkok city center, alongside the BTS Asok Skytrain and steps from the Sukhumvit MRT subway station. Find the ideal event accommodations at our hotel on Sukhumvit Road, whether you're attending an event at Queen Sirikit National Convention Center (QSNCC), Bangkok International Trade & Exhibition Center (BITEC) or IMPACT Arena. Delight in downtown Bangkok's inspiring culture and nightlife, just minutes away. Stay fit in our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, relax at Vareena Spa or dip in our hotel's rooftop swimming pool. Expect an inspiring experience in our first-class restaurants. Favored by Japanese expats, Kisso has been voted Best Japanese Restaurant in Bangkok. Visit Seasonal Tastes restaurant for our international buffet, filled with delectable dishes, or stop by Zest Bar & Terrace for a quick drink. Our five-star hotel keeps you connected with high-speed internet before you end the day in the comfort of a Heavenly® Bed.Marriott

name: Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa
description: Situated in lush surroundings between Suvarnabhumi International Airport (BKK) and the city centre, Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa is the perfect starting point for discovery in Thailand. From Bangkok's modern nightlife to its ancient temples and palaces, fully immerse yourself in our culture. Sensory experiences are found throughout our five-star luxury resort in Bangkok, from visionary meeting rooms that encourage innovation to restaurants that delight the palate. For hours of leisure and entertainment, visit Explore Spa by Le Méridien, Summit Windmill Golf Club or our outdoor saltwater infinity pool. Delight in unexpected accommodation with your freestanding bathtub, glass-enclosed rain shower, or LM BED with an artistic rendering of a traditional Wai greeting. Every hotel room at our Bangkok luxury resort includes sweeping golf course views from floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony or terrace. Change your perspective at Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Novotel Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport
description: Our 4 star hotel is the official hotel of Suvarnabhumi airport. Offering 612 guest rooms and suites made with Thai designs, our key focuses are exclusive accommodations and excellent accessibility and convenience. Providing 24-Hour Flexi with no set check-in when our guests arrive at our hotel, you have the luxury to plan your day without worrying about predetermined check-in timings. Our airport hotel also has features 8 restaurants and bars, VOUS spa, a tropical swimming pool with pool bar and more.accorhotels.com

name: The Athenee Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok
description: Modern yet inspired by Thai culture, with thoughtful touches in every design decision, The Athenee Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok is rooted in authentic experiences. Situated in Sukhumvit, one of the most central districts of Bangkok, guests are steps from the Skytrain connecting directly to premium shopping malls and local attractions. Built on the grounds of Kandhavas, the palace of Princess Valaya Alongkorn, daughter of King Rama V, our Bangkok five-star hotel encapsulates elegance and allure. Whether you are savoring curated menus at one of our eight restaurants, indulging in holistic treatments at Athenee Spa, floating in our free-form rooftop pool or enchanting guests from eco-friendly venues, unsurpassed experiences await on Wireless Road. Reserve a pet-friendly room styled after Thai epochs at our luxury hotel in Sukhumvit, or select a suite offering butler services such as private check-in, shoe shining and a personal shopper. The Athenee Hotel welcomes you to Bangkok with distinction.Marriott

name: Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit
address: 2 Sukhumvit Soi 57, Klongtan Nua, Wattana, Bangkok 10110
description: With Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit, you find the future of travel near Bangkok's shopping, dining, entertainment and tourist attractions, as well as business hotspots such as BITEC. Our hotel near Sukhumvit Road is in the heart of Bangkok's most chic and energetic districts. Rest in well-appointed hotel rooms replete with pillowtop mattresses, marble bathrooms and views of the popular Sukhumvit area. Upgrade to a luxury suite for more five-star perks such as free cocktails and access to an Executive Lounge. Savor some of Bangkok's finest cuisine at our award-winning steakhouse and rooftop bar or indulge in sweet bites at our hotel's in-house dessert shop. Use our onsite dining to cater meetings, weddings and social affairs in 10,700 square feet of flexible event space, enhanced by expert planners. At Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit, we help you feel confident when you are on the road and especially when you're on Sukhumvit Road.Marriott

name: lebua at State Tower - SHA Plus
description: Awarded the 2021 Top Hotel in Bangkok by Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards, the luxurious Lebua at State Tower is home to one of the highest rooftop bar in the world with stunning views of the city. This modern property is ideally located in Silom and is within walking distance of Saphan Taksin BTS Station. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Amenities include complimentary wireless internet access, a swimming pool and a sauna. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Swimming Pool. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a private balcony. They all offer an in-room closet, slippers and a flat-screen TV. Lebua at State Tower boasts convenient dining options, including French dishes at Chef’s Table - Two-Michelin-Star and international and Mediterranean meals at Sirocco - Dining under the stars. Additionally there is an elegant cocktail bar on-site, which has an impressive cocktail list. Guests can also relax with a drink at Distil Bar. Lebua at State Tower is within walking distance of the Bangkok Folk Museum, the Taksin Bridge and Si Lom. For those wishing to eat out, the hotel is close to a variety of local cafés and restaurants.Revato

name: Galleria 10 Sukhumvit Bangkok by Compass Hospitality
description: Located under a 10-minute stroll from Asok BTS Skytrain Station, Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality offers guests an ideal base when in Bangkok. Offering free wireless internet, a restaurant and an outdoor pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Terminal 21. Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality has a gym with a swimming pool. There is also free private parking on site for guests with a car. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and a rain shower. Each has a bathroom that provides a bathtub and slippers. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality, and there are numerous cafés and eateries nearby. The in-house restaurant, Nomad, serves Asian, American and European cuisine. Located within walking distance of BTS Nana Station, the hotel offers a tour desk with information on what to see in Bangkok. Guests can also visit Soi Cowboy.Revato

name: Villa De Pranakorn
description: Set in Bangkok, less than 1 km from Wat Saket, Villa De Pranakorn offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel provides an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests at Villa De Pranakorn can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Khao San Road, Temple of the Emerald Buddha and Wat Pho. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 26 km from Villa De Pranakorn, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Sukhumvit 15 Bangkok
description: Located in the heart of Bangkoks Central Business District. The hotels key features are its personalized service, and comfortably appointed accommodation with 363 rooms, surround lush tropical foliage replete with cascading waterfall, hanging gardens and an iconic central Plumier Lelawadee tree. Also featured is an elegant all day dining restaurant with live cooking station preparing beautiful Thai and international delicacies and a breathtaking rooftop bar and pool offering panoramic views over Bangkok.accorhotels.com

name: Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok
description: Experience unrivaled luxury and sophistication at Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, a Luxury Collection Hotel, ideally located on Sukhumvit Road. With direct access to the BTS SkyTrain and close proximity to the MRT station, the city’s best experiences and tourist attractions are only a few stops away. Escape the bustling city life and enter a world of serenity at our free-form swimming pool and The Grande Spa. Indulge in a world of culinary delights from the finest local authentic flavors to delectable international cuisines at our award-winning restaurants that promise an unforgettable culinary experience. Our 420 spacious guest rooms and suites showcase the essence of local culture with a luxurious twist and our latest technology and connectivity, ensure you stay up to date and connected with loved ones or business clients. Discover the pinnacle of luxury Bangkok hotels at the Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, where every moment is an exquisite revelation.Marriott

name: Pathumwan Princess Hotel
address: 444 Mbk Center, Phayathai Rd., Wangmai, Bangkok 10330
description: Blending Thai hospitality and stylish décor, the award-winning 5-star Pathumwan Princess Hotel - SHA Extra Plus Certified - SHA Certified is located just next to MBK Shopping Centre and opposite Siam Square. It offers 10 dining options, an outdoor pool and a tennis court. Pathumwan Princess Hotel - SHA Extra Plus Certified - SHA Certified is 24 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport. The hotel is directly connected to National Stadium BTS Skytrain Station and a 5-minute walk from Siam BTS Skytrain Station. With beautiful dark wood flooring, spacious rooms at Pathumwan Princess have floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic views of the Bangkok skyline. Each room comes with a flat-screen cable/satellite TV and modern glass bathrooms. Pathumwan Princess Hotel - SHA Extra Plus Certified - SHA Certified features relaxing massage treatments and meditation rooms. Rooftop tennis courts and a jogging track are available at The Olympic Club Fitness Centre. Meetings and events can be arranged at Pathumwan Princess. Dining options at Pathumwan Princess include Italian, Korean, European and Thai dishes. Sandwiches and coffee are available at t@Lobby Café. Studio Bar offers jazz music and cocktails.

name: JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok
description: Enjoy having Thailand at your doorstep from our downtown Bangkok hotel. JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok is a 5-star oasis with modern spaces and luxury amenities that pamper and inspire. Multilingual hotel associates provide signature Marriott service at every moment, ensuring a visit that is nothing short of extraordinary. Unwind with indulgent spa treatments, lounge in a designer chaise by the palm-tree-framed tiled pool or refresh in our hotel's modern fitness center. Our beautifully appointed hotel rooms and suites blend downtown Bangkok views with impeccable design and 5-star perks. Superb hotel dining ranges from a fashionably cool New York Steakhouse to authentic Chinese and Japanese delicacies, and cozy cafés for casual sipping and socializing. For a memorable wedding or impressive meeting in Bangkok, take advantage of 14,412 square feet of sophisticated event space, fully customizable to meet your vision. JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok is where exceptional luxury emerges in the heart of Bangkok, Thailand.Marriott

name: Chillax Resort
description: Chillax Resort is 0.6 km from Khoasan Road. Boasting an infinity pool, the hotel features free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site. The hotel is 1.1 km to Democracy Monument. Grand Palace is located 1.4 km from the hotel, while Wat Pho Temple is 1.8 km away. Each air-conditioned room features a TV, minibar and en suite bathroom with shower facilities and free toiletries. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. The hotel also includes baggage storage and safe. A fitness centre is also available. A wide range of Thai and Western cuisine can be enjoyed at Pranakhon Restaurant. Guests can also sit back and enjoy refreshing drinks, snacks and soothing music at the Kappu Lounge.

name: Pullman Bangkok King Power
description: Pullman Bangkok King Power is a lifestyle hotel in the heart of the city where travelers can experience a true 'resort in the city', inspired by Pullman's unique 'Bleisure' concept, a space in which business and leisure blend seamlessly together. Whatever your reason for being in Bangkok, our Bangkok city hotel is ideally located for both business or leisure travelers, and the property is only moments away from Victory Monument BTS Skytrain Station and within easy reach of the Phaya Thai Airport Rail Linkaccorhotels.com

name: Tower Club at lebua
description: Situated in Silom, Tower Club at Lebua offers 5-star accommodation and a sauna, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Spa and wellness centre and Fitness centre. Guests on business can benefit from the hotel's executive floor, photocopier and meeting rooms, plus enjoy views of Bangkok. For trendy travellers a vodka bar provides a delightful setting for an after-meal drink. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. All rooms feature a modern décor, air-conditioning and a private balcony. Bathrooms are stocked with necessities like bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Tower Club at Lebua's elegant bar has a varied drinks menu, while the in-house restaurant serves Mediterranean and international dishes. Alternatively, there are a variety of other eating options in the local area. Tower Club at Lebua is just a short walk from Chao Phraya River and State Tower. For those travelling by car, the hotel offers free private parking on site.Revato

name: Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11
description: Discover an oasis in Sukhumvit, Bangkok. Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 is an urban gem in a stimulating travel destination. Our hotel in Sukhumvit features loft-inspired rooms and suites with tech-smart features, free Wi-Fi and panoramic views of the Bangkok cityscape. Our hotel's prime location in Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok, places the excitement of Soi 11 at your doorstep, you can also take advantage of our complimentary hotel shuttle to the Nana BTS SkyTrain and Sukhumvit MRT subway stations for access to celebrated attractions. Bring your vision to life in versatile event spaces designed for productive corporate gatherings and flawless social affairs. Unwind at our pool after a busy day of work or exploring Bangkok with cocktails or enjoy a live entertainment at our W XYZ Bar. Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 has everything you need for Thailand business trips or vacations.Marriott

name: Bliston Suwan Park View
address: No9 Soi Tonson, Ploenchit Rd, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330
description: Bliston Hotel offers a luxurious and tranquil retreat in Bangkok, a 3-minute walk from Chidlom Skytrain Station. It provides spa treatments, an outdoor pool and a restaurant offering foie gras. Bliston Suwan Park View - SHA Plus hotel is a 30-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Popular shopping areas like Central World Plaza and the Pratunam Wholesale Market are about 1 km away. Spacious with wooden flooring, the air-conditioned apartments offer ample seating area. They have well-equipped kitchens and modern home entertainment systems with cable TV. Bathrooms come with a bathtub. Relaxation options at the Bliston Suwan Hotel include a rooftop swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and a steam bath. The fitness centre provides professional trainers to assist guests. Spa@Tonson specialises in Thai massage. Offering a fine dining experience, Artur Restaurant features prime steaks, as well as, fresh seafood. The restaurant is well-known for its Caesar salad and extensive martini menu. The hotel offers room service, babysitting and laundry services. Car rentals are also provided for added convenience.

name: The Okura Prestige Bangkok
address: Park Venture Ecoplex, 57 Wireless Road, Bangkok 10330
description: This 5-star hotel offers modern accommodation in Bangkok and is a short stroll from BTS Phloen Chit Station. Guests also have exclusive access to the The Okura Spa and Cantilevered Swimming Pool. Guests staying at The Okura Prestige Bangkok Hotel can enjoy taking a dip in the infinity pool, working out in the fitness centre or unwinding with a drink at the on site bar. Amenities include free Wi-Fi and a sauna. It also features a sun deck with impressive city views. The Okura Prestige Bangkok Hotel has air conditioned rooms with luxury toiletries, a rain shower and a pillow menu. They feature a refrigerator, a mini bar and converters/voltage adaptors. The hotel boasts convenient dining options, including Japanese cuisines at Yamazato Restaurant and international meals at Up & Above Restaurant. Elements, Inspired by Ciel Bleu offers a fine dining experience, serving French cuisine in a award-winning setting. Situated in Siam, The Okura Prestige Bangkok Hotel is close to popular nightlife destinations. Big C, Centralworld and the Erawan Shrine are a brief stroll away.Revato

name: Chatrium Grand Bangkok
description: Situated a short walk from Siam BTS Station, Chatrium Grand Bangkok is an ideal base when in Bangkok. It also provides free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a butler service. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, including an executive floor, facial treatments and body treatments. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. Chatrium Grand Bangkok offers air conditioned rooms with slippers, a mini bar and a rain shower. Each have tea and coffee making facilities, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with bathrobes. The hotel boasts convenient dining options, including international dishes at Savio and Mediterranean food at Casia. Each evening, guests can wind down in the lounge bar. Bangkok's attractions, including Siam Paragon, Siam Square and Centralworld, are within easy walking distance of Chatrium Grand Bangkok. It is also within walking distance of Big C and the Erawan Shrine.Revato

name: Grande Centre Point Ploenchit
description: Grande Centre Point Hotel Ploenchit provides elegant accommodation in Bangkok and is a few minutes on foot from BTS Phloen Chit Station. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Let's Relax Spa and Swimming pool. This 5-star hotel offers an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and a sauna. There is also free private parking on site for those with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private balcony, slippers and a refrigerator. They each have a private bathroom, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Guests staying at Grande Centre Point Hotel Ploenchit can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally situated for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Room service is also available during limited hours. Grande Centre Point Hotel Ploenchit is close to shops, dining and Bangkok's nightlife. The Erawan Shrine, Centralworld and Central Chidlom are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Night Hotel Bangkok - Sukhumvit 15
description: A 5-minute walk from Sukhumvit MRT station and Asok BTS station, Night Hotel Bangkok is located on Sukhumvit 15. It offers a rooftop swimming pool and rooms with 42-inch flat-screen TVs. Free WiFi access and parking are available. Night Hotel Bangkok is Pet-Friendly. The stylish rooms at Night Hotel Bangkok are spacious and come with modern décor. Each room features Egyptian bed-sheet cotton and allergen-free pillows. Other amenities include a filled minibar, tea&coffee making with boiler and bathroom amenities on-demand. The hotel offers laundry and dry cleaning services. Currency exchange services are also available. Flava Restaurant offers views of Bangkok city, and serves up a wide spread of Italian and Thai dishes. The Flava Lounge provides a comfortable venue for guests to sip their cocktails. Night Hotel Bangkok is 25 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport and Don Mueng Airport. Walking distance 450 metres from Terminal 21 and Robinson Shopping Malls. Arnabhumi Airport is 31.1 km from the property.

name: Sivatel Bangkok
description: Live the high life at Sivatel Bangkok Hotel, a 5-star luxurious hotel with free Wi-Fi, 2 dining options and an infinity pool. It is centrally located in Bangkok's Ploenchit area in Pathumwan district. Sivatel Bangkok Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Ploenchit BTS Skytrain Station and less than 1 km from shopping at Central World Plaza and Pratunam Market. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is 40 km from the hotel. The modern rooms are equipped with a 40-inch flat-screen TV, iPod dock and Apple TV systems. A minibar and personal safe are also included. Spacious bathrooms feature a bathtub and floor-to-ceiling windows with beautiful city views. The Porch offers international cuisine and fine wine in an elegant setting. Other dining options include coffee at Cafe Jardin. Recreation choices include working out at the fitness centre, or enjoying a massage at the spa. The hotel also provides a business centre, tour desk and concierge services.

name: 137 Pillars Residences Bangkok
description: The luxurious 137 Pillars Residences Bangkok offers comfortable residence-style suites with plush furnishings, white marble and free WiFi. This 5-star property is 1 km from Phrom Phong BTS Skytrain Station and the endless shopping options at Em District. Additionally, a free private transfer service is provided to and from those spots for the convenience of guests. City views can be enjoyed from the infinity pool and plunge pool on the 27th floor. Offering a private balcony with seating, the fully-appointed suites are air-conditioned and come with a dining table, an equipped kitchen and a flat-screen TV with international channels. The hotel has studios, 1-bedroom suites and 2-bedroom suites for guests to choose from. All en suite bathrooms come complete with a bathtub, rain shower, a Japanese-style toilet and complimentary Panpuri amenities. Other in-room amenities include a washing machine, a soundbar system and a telephone. With a variety of high class services and facilities, some highlights at 137 Pillars Residences Bangkok include a putting green, a fitness centre and a spa. The concierge team can assist guest with personalized information during their stay. A variety of dining and drinking options are also on offer to provide a range of cuisines and experiences, with both indoor and outdoor seating. With some of Bangkok's best restaurants and trendy spots nearby, 137 Pillars Residences is a 30 km drive from Suvarnabhumi Interational Airport and airport transfers can be arranged.

name: Amaranta Hotel
description: A 5-minute drive from Central Plaza Rama 9 Department Store, Amaranta Hotel - SHA Plus offers spacious suites with a kitchen and a spa bath. The property features rooftop bar and pool, laundry service and a fitness centre. Guests have access to free on-site parking space and free WiFi. Hotel Amaranta is a 3-minute walk to Huai Khwang MRT Subway Station, providing great access throughout the city. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 40-minute drive away. All guest rooms are elegantly furnished with modern décor. Each unit features a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. A hairdryer is included in a private bathroom. Guests can sample international dishes at the hotel's 2 restaurants. Copper Restaurant offers a wine list and classic cocktails under an atrium in the glow of an aquarium. Thai-Italian dishes are served at Greendish Restaurant.

name: Le Méridien Bangkok
description: Stimulate your senses at Le Méridien Bangkok, an award-winning, art-inspired, five-star hotel in Bangkok, Thailand's exhilarating capital. Set on Surawong Road in the Silom business hub, our high-end hotel is steps from the vibrant Patpong Night Market, celebrated nightlife and Samyan Mitrtown. Access the best of Bangkok via the nearby Sala Daeng BTS and Sam Yan MRT stations. Ground your getaway in luxury, sipping cocktails beside our hotel's outdoor pool overlooking the iconic Mahanakhon building. Get pampered at the world-class spa and sustain yourself with curated local Asian and European cuisine. Visiting Bangkok for a destination wedding or corporate gathering? Our Silom, Bangkok hotel's versatile venues include a ballroom with a nine-metre ceiling alongside state-of-the-art meeting rooms. After each enriching day in Silom, retire to your plush sanctuary and watch the sunset over Bangkok's gilded temples and jagged skyscrapers. Savor the good life in this storied city at Le Méridien Bangkok.Marriott

name: Lit Bangkok Residence
description: Located within a few minutes' walk of Bangkok's premier shopping destinations, LiT BANGKOK Residence - SHA Extra Plus is a stylish hotel with spacious studios and suites. With free WiFi in public areas, this hotel is 150 metres from National Stadium BTS Skytrain Station. MBK Shopping Centre, Siam Paragon and Siam Centre, which are all within a 5-minute walk, provide a variety of shopping and dining options for guests. It is 400 metres from Jim Thompson's House and 25 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. All air-conditioned studios and suites feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a sofa seating area and a dining table. Complete with a microwave, the kitchenette comes with a minibar and kitchenware. Extras in the room include a safety deposit box and a balcony, while suites also offer a washing machine. Free toiletries, a shower and bathtub can be found in the en suite bathroom. Guests staying at LiT BANGKOK Residence - SHA Extra Plus can stay fit at the fitness centre or sample local and international dishes at the restaurant. Staff can provide concierge services, assistance with laundry and shuttles between Hotel & Residence buildings.

name: Mercure Bangkok Makkasan
description: Conveniently located in the city center of Bangkok, Mercure Bangkok Makkasan is a 4-star hotel with easy access to the Bangkok Airport Link Makkasan Station and MRT Petchaburi. The hotel offers 180 rooms & suites designed with a modern style. The hotel facilities include an all-day-dining restaurant, wine bar, swimming pool, gym, meeting rooms and free car park. It is the perfect place for both leisure & business travelers. Pick up from MRT Petchaburi station is also available by calling at +66 21153333.accorhotels.com

name: Jasmine City Hotel
description: Jasmine City Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, a fully equipped fitness centre and free WiFi in public areas. It is a 3-minute walk to BTS Asoke Sky Train and MRT Sukhumvit Subway Stations. The property is a 5-minute walk to Terminal 21 Shopping Mall. It is a 10-minute drive to Emporium Department Store and Benjasiri Park. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Rooms at the Jasmine City Hotel feature a fully equipped kitchen, living room and TV with cable channels. The hotel provides daily house-keeping and room service. Free wireless internet access is available in the entire hotel. An outdoor hot tub offers relaxation. Japanese translators are available upon request. Balcony Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in a casual environment. Drinks and snacks can also be enjoyed by the pool.

name: Holiday Inn Bangkok
description: Holiday Inn Bangkok has 379 rooms and suites, and being located in the centre of Bangkok is easily accessible from both Suvarnabhumi International Airport and Don Mueang International Airport, both only about 35 minutes away. The location makes the hotel perfect for exploring the city and its shopping districts, malls and shrines. Both the BTS Skytrain Chit Lom station and the Skywalk are at the doorstep of the hotel. This means that famous shopping destinations such as CentralWorld, Siam Paragon, Siam Discovery, MBK, Central Chidlom, Platinum Mall and Pratunam Market are within easy walking distance via the covered Skywalk, while cultural attractions including the Grand Palace, Chinatown, Jim Thompson House and Chatuchak Weekend Market can all be visited using the Skytrain. Holiday Inn Bangkok provides a variety of food and beverage outlets. Ginger is an all-day restaurant offering authentic Thai and Western dishes. At Beer Republic, guests can explore the largest beer selection in Bangkok, along with European and Thai bar food, with live music daily. ConneXion, a multi-purpose lounge with natural daylight, makes an ideal place either for working or relaxing. For leisure and fitness there is a 12.5-metre pool, conveniently located next to the 24-hour fitness centre and sauna. Around-the-clock convenience stores are available in the immediate neighborhood of the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club
description: This comfortable hotel in Pathum Thani provides complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as a sauna and an outdoor pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the D Health Massage and Olympic Club. Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club provides a golf course, a ballroom and facial treatments. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club provides 128 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. All have a sitting area and a range of entertainment options, such as a flat-screen TV. The hotel features a conveniently located café, ideal for those who want a bite to eat without having to leave the property. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 55-minute drive from Tinidee Hotel Bangkok Golf Club. The hotel can organise car rental and an airport shuttle, in addition to offering a city centre shuttle service.Revato

name: Shangri-La Bangkok
address: 89 Soi Wat Suan Plu, New Road, Bangkok 10500
description: Situated along the Chao Phraya River, Shangri-La Bangkok boasts a 10,000-sqf Fitness Centre and the multi-awarded Chi, The Spa at Shangri-La. Among its 9 dining options is an award-winning restaurant. Guests can join daily aerobics and exercise classes at the hotel, or play a game of tennis. Shangri-La Bangkok also has a spa pool, sauna and steam room. Other facilities include a shopping arcade. Offering city or river views, rooms at the Shangri-La feature Thai décor with silk and wood furnishings. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a minibar. Authentic Thai cuisine is served at Salathip Restaurant where guests can enjoy its live music and at-home luxury atmosphere. The re-envisioned 'Volti Tuscan Grill & Bar’ showcases the world’s finest meats, cooked in authentic Tuscan smoked and wood-fire style. The Chocolate Boutique offers an indulgent range of sweets and hot drinks. Located in Silom, Shangri-La Bangkok is adjacent to Saphan Taksin BTS Skytrain Station. A shuttle boat service to ICONSIAM Shopping Mall is available from Sathon Pier. Driving from Suvarnabhumi International Airport takes around 40 minutes.

name: Bandara Suites Silom
description: Located in Silom District, Bandara Suites offers rooms and suites with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. It features 2 dining options, 2 swimming pools and a pool bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. Situated in one of Bangkok City’s shopping, dining and entertainment districts, Bandara Suites is a 10-minute walk from MRT Silom and BTS Saladaeng stations. Each room and suite at the Bandara Bangkok has a minibar, tea/coffee maker and electronic safe. Attached bathrooms include a shower and bathtub. Suites come with a kitchenette. Guests enjoy a welcome drink upon arrival. Recreation facilities include a fitness centre, an outdoor hot tub, and sauna rooms. Free parking is provided. Japanese cuisine and saké is served at Touka Restaurant where there is an open kitchen.the Restaurant is open 11.00-14.00hrs. and 17.00-23.00 hrs. daily

name: Intercontinental Bangkok
description: In central Bangkok and one of the city's largest hotels, InterContinental Bangkok provides ultra-modern luxury and a true cosmopolitan escape. The hotel stands adjacent to the BTS Chitlom Skytrain station, making travel to local cultural attractions quick and convenient. Thailand's largest shopping malls are within walking distance such as Central World and Central Chitlom and major world-class medical centers can be reached in a mere 10 minutes. Visit now for Bangkok’s best weather of the year.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queens Park
address: 199 Sukhumvit Soi 22, Klong Ton, Klong Toey, Bangkok 10110
description: Discover a tranquil oasis in the heart of Sukhumvit at Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen's Park. Stay at our luxury hotel in Bangkok to meet, play, dine and sleep in Thailand's exotic capital. Perfect for Thailand business trips and vacations, our hotel in Sukhumvit is a short walk from popular downtown attractions and within easy reach of the BTS Skytrain, MRT subway, Queen Sirikit National Convention Center (QSNCC) and Suvarnabhumi Airport. Unwind at our pool and spa after a busy day of work or exploring Bangkok. Savor exceptional cuisine in our award-winning restaurants, which feature Chinese, Japanese and Thai dishes. Host an impressive corporate event in 53,000 square feet of function space with capacity for up to 1,500 attendees. At day's end, retire to your hotel room or suite, where you'll enjoy luxury amenities and polished décor that blends classic Thai influences with modern accents. Many of the accommodations at our Sukhumvit, Bangkok hotel showcase breathtaking views of the downtown city skyline.Marriott

name: The Sukosol
description: No description found

name: Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel
description: A minute’s walk from Ratchadamri Skytrain Station, Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel is a touch of Thai luxury in the city. The hotel features a spa, an outdoor pool and free parking. Rooms feature elegant touches of Thai culture, offering décor made of teak and Thai silk. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are provided. Grand, en suite bathrooms showcase elegantly carved wood furnishings. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Central World Plaza and Lumpini Park. Bumrungrad International Hospital is a 12-minute drive away, while Suvarnabhumi International Airport is 25 km away. The Spa by MSpa provides the option of a spa suite with a private plunge pool and complimentary herbal tea and cookies. Guests can head for the health club which has a steam room and offers fitness classes. Younger guests can look forward to treats such as bedtime milk and cookies and a range of children’s toiletries. The hotel provides 9 restaurants and lounges including Italian cuisine and Japanese creations. Local Thai delights are featured at Spice Market while Mocha and Muffins serves a selection of cold cuts, sandwiches and fine wines. Aqua Lounge and The Terrace offer casual dining options.

name: Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok
description: Luxurious stays await at Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok, with multiple pools situated within landscaped grounds. Featuring a direct access to Siam Paragon shopping centre, This resort-style hotel boasts free WiFi, fine dining and a world-class spa. Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok enjoys easy access to Siam BTS Skytrain Station through Siam Paragon Mall. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is about 24 km from the hotel. The spacious rooms at Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok are contemporary and stylish. Each comes with tea/coffee making facilities with an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV with international channels, while certain rooms provide a pool access. Complimentary soft drinks and local beer are available from the minibar. En suite bathrooms have slippers, free toiletries and a bath or shower. Siam Kempinski boasts 3 restaurants offering an international buffet breakfast, modern Thai cuisine and and all-day dining.

name: Waldorf Astoria Bangkok
description: Blending Thai charm with comfortable luxury, Waldorf Astoria Bangkok is an iconic presence in the heart of Thailand's bustling capital. The hotel's stylish contemporary design is by renowned architectural interior designer Andre Fu and AvroKo. Waldorf Astoria Bangkok presents an exclusive selection of distinctive dining and entertainment venues, spacious and indulgent guest rooms, top-notch relaxation facilities, and efficient meeting facilities. Situated on ultra-modern Magnolias Ratchadamri Boulevard and located in the heart of Ratchaprasong intersection, Waldorf Astoria Bangkok is within walking distance of renowned shopping precincts and tourist landmarks. All guests can enjoy a variety of luxurious in-room and on-property amenities, including - Sumptuous guest rooms, starting at 50 sq. m; with floor-to-ceiling windows - 6 restaurants and bars, including a New-York inspired American grill Bull and Bear and a signature Thai restaurant Front Room - Waldorf Astoria Spa, an intimate wellness escape with a spa treatment menu that embraces cosmopolitan and local cultural influences - Open-air temperature controlled pool with private cabanas, plus a 24-hour fitness studio - Diverse settings with natural light for corporate meetings, social events and weddings - Personal Concierge for entire stay, providing anticipatory yet unobtrusive serviceHilton

name: Bangkok Marriott Hotel The Surawongse
address: 262 Thanon Surawong, Khwaeng Si Phraya, Bangkok 10500
description: Unwind during a romantic escape or move your business forward during a corporate trip to Thailand at Bangkok Marriott Hotel The Surawongse. Our hotel is located on Surawong Road near Chinatown, the Chao Phraya River and the popular Silom shopping district. Find us only a few minutes from Queen Sirikit National Convention Center (QSNCC), one of the largest convention centers in downtown Bangkok. Retreat to a spacious, extended-stay hotel room or suite filled with luxury amenities and décor that merge the traditional and the contemporary. Relax in our hotel's outdoor infinity pool and stay energized in our 24-hour fitness center before a massage at Quan Spa. Dine on tasty Thai treats at Praya Kitchen, serving our signature take on Bangkok street food, or sample classic Chinese cuisine at Yao Restaurant. At the end of your day in Thailand, head to Yao Rooftop Bar for curated cocktails. Bangkok Marriott Hotel The Surawongse transforms every stay in downtown Bangkok into an adventure.Marriott

name: Renaissance Bangkok Ratchaprasong Hotel
description: Experience a new way to work, stay, and play in Bangkok's vibrant city center at Renaissance Bangkok Ratchaprasong Hotel. Our five-star Bangkok city center hotel features modern amenities and upscale accommodations near some of the city's top business and cultural attractions, including the Victory Monument, the Grand Palace, Siam Paragon Mall and the BTS Sky Train. After exploring Ratchaprasong's many delights, revitalize yourself in our hotel's fully equipped fitness center, refreshing indoor pool or tranquil day spa. Treat yourself to authentic Chinese delicacies, seasonal Italian dishes and appetizing tapas at our hotel's delicious on-site restaurants. Make new connections in 20,000 square feet of sophisticated meeting space, customizable for any style or size of event. In the evening, retreat to a luxury room or suite with plush bedding, a sleek bathroom, free Wi-Fi and oversized windows at our Bangkok hotel with a view. Get swept up in the magic of Thailand at Renaissance Bangkok Ratchaprasong Hotel.Marriott

name: Novotel Bangkok Ploenchit Sukhumvit
description: "Novotel Bangkok Ploenchit Sukhumvit is located at the heart of Bangkok's city centre, providing a convenient location for both business and leisure. We offer world class facilities, featuring an outdoor swimming pool, gym with sauna and 24/7 à la carte service. Our 4-star hotel is within walking distance to Ploenchit BTS Skytrain Station, Central Embassy and Sukhumvit Road along with attractions and shopping malls such as Siam Paragon and The Emquatier. Let us give you an experience true to Bangkok."accorhotels.com

name: The Siam
description: Situated along the city side of Chaopraya River, The Siam features luxury accommodation with modern facilities. Designed by internationally acclaimed architect Bill Bensley, it boasts an outdoor pool and on-site parking facilities. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Siam is located 3 km away from Vimanmek Teak Palace and 5 km away from the popular Grand Palace. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is located 35 km away. Free shuttle boat from the hotel to Sathorn Pier is available from 10:00-18:00 hrs. The villas and the suite are tastefully decorated and equipped with air conditioning, a TV and a minibar. Guests can also enjoy a fresh fruit basket and access to unlimited local phone calls. All stylish bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and shower facilities. Guests can work out at the well-equipped fitness centre, relax at the spa or curl up with a book at the library. Other services available include a 24-hour front desk, currency exchange and babysitting. Butler services are also available for extra convenience. Set within a cluster of three Thai teak wood houses, Chon Thai Restaurant offers delicious Thai cuisine. Other dining options include Deco Bar & Bistro. Inspired by the jazzy ambiance combined with black and white interiors, it serves international cuisines, as well as cocktails and a great selection of wine.
